title: The Sterling Shore Series
description: Limited time bundle that includes Book 1, 1.5, 2, and 3 of the Sterling Shore series. No cliffhangers.  Book 1 - Hooked on the Game  Kade Colton and Raya Capperton come from two different worlds, but one thing they have in common is that they have both judged each other wrong. Opposites don't just attract; they collide and shift the world off its axis.  Raya's POV Descriptive Sex Language not suitable for some audiences  Book 1.5 - Kade's Game  There are two sides to every story... You've seen Raya's side of the story. Now it's Kade's turn.  Kade's POV Descriptive Sex Language not suitable for some audiencesBook 2 - Tagged & Ashed  Tag Masters is the playboy no one can tame, and Ashiara Branderwood is looking for a fun weekend like she's never had. Who better to spend it with than the illusive bachelor all the Sterling Shore women seem to want? But sometimes the things that impact our lives the greatest are the moments we never expect to last.  Dual POV Descriptive Sex Language not suitable for some audiences  Book 3 - The Sterling Boys  Rain Noles left Sterling Shore heartbroken, and Dane Sterling stayed behind to grow resentful. Sometimes you lose precious things because of too much pride. But sometimes you also get a second chance.  Dual POV Descriptive Sex Language not suitable for some audiences
author: C.M. Owens
